price: Wobɛhunu sε nnipa rewura Onyankopͻn som no mu akuo-akuo.
arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan
